name: Build Resume

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repo
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Build resume using Docker
        run: |
          docker build -t resume-builder .
          mkdir output
          docker run --rm -v ${{ github.workspace }}/output:/data resume-builder

      - name: Upload output files
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
        with:
          name: resume-files
          path: output/
